title: Redesigning Online Real-Time University Mathematics Education Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of undergraduate-level mathematics (calculus, linear algebra)
context.additional_context: An intensive short-term course based on virtual classroom environments for in-service practitioners to strengthen practical competencies, emphasizing real-time interaction and collaborative learning in a provided digital device environment

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate the ability to solve mathematical modeling problems using real-time collaboration tools in virtual classrooms
Learners can write and submit case analysis reports on applying mathematical concepts to practical tasks in online real-time environments
Learners achieve at least 80% proficiency in summative assessments provided through digital evaluation tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
